  • Method Details

    • distance

      public static double distance(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1)
      Calculates the Euclidean distance between two points.
      Parameters:
      x0 - x-coordinate of the first point
      y0 - y-coordinate of the first point
      x1 - x-coordinate of the second point
      y1 - y-coordinate of the second point
      Returns:
      the distance between the points (x0, y0) and (x1, y1)

    • createShape

      public static javafx.scene.shape.Shape createShape(Class<?> clazz, double x, double y, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Initializes given shape at point (x,y) and provided color.
      Parameters:
      clazz - shape to be initialized
      x - origin x coordinate
      y - origin y coordinate
      color - shape's fill color
      Returns:
      Shape initialazed with given parameters, or null initialization was unsuccessfull
